author: sig_antonio
title: The Return!!
text:
A brief update on our previous review...
My wife and I last visited Paris in April 2015 and at that time I wrote a review of our stay in Le Madison entitled “Guaranteed to Return”.
Perhaps a dangerous statement to make.
We actually did return in January to celebrate my Wife’s birthday fulfilling that earlier prophesy and in doing so experiencing again the joy of this part of Paris from the absolute comfort of this wonderful hotel.
It was in fact just as we’d remembered in every aspect of the level of comfort and service and the friendly and professional staff team.
On this stay we also had breakfast in the hotel and I would recommend that you do so during your stay.
No change here from our last visit.... consistently excellent and will remain our hotel of choice in Paris.
